text: Eyo bwe yavaayo, n’asanga Yekonadabu mutabani wa Lekabu10:15 Abalekabu bazzukulu ba Lekabu, ate era bazzukulu ba Yesero; baawangaala okutuusa mu biro bya Yeremiya (Yer 35:6, 8). Baanyiikira nnyo okusinza Mukama ate nga balunzi ng’ajja okumusisinkana. Yeeku n’amulamusa, n’amubuuza nti, “Ossa kimu nange, nga nze bwe nzisa ekimu naawe?”
